Summary: Send a chat message and receive a response.
Expected Data:
model (string): Required. Options include gpt-35-turbo, gpt-4o, gpt-4-1106-Preview, anthropic.claude-3-haiku-20240307-v1:0, etc.
temperature (number)
max_tokens (integer)
dataSources (array of strings)
messages (array of objects):
role (string): Required. Options include system, assistant, user.
content (string): Required.
type (string): Options include prompt.
options (object):
dataSourceOptions (object)
ragOnly (boolean)
skipRag (boolean)
assistantId (string)
model (object):
id (string): Options include gpt-35-turbo, gpt-4o, etc.
prompt (string)
Responses:
200: Chat stream response.
Content: application/json
data (string)
400: Bad request, invalid or missing fields.
401: Unauthorized, invalid authentication credentials.
403: Forbidden, request refused.
404: Not found, resource not found.

Expected Data:
note (string)
sharedWith (array of strings): Required.
sharedData (object): Required.
Responses:
200: State data successfully shared.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
error (string, nullable)
400: Bad request, missing or invalid parameters.
401: User does not have access to the share functionality.

200: List of shared data records.
Content: application/json
sharedBy (string)
note (string)
sharedAt (string, date-time)
key (string)

Summary: Load shared state data from storage.
Responses:
200: Shared data loaded successfully.
Content: application/json
exportSchema
401: User does not have access to the share functionality.
404: Data not found.

Summary: Upload a file to the assistant.
Expected Data:
actions (array of objects): Required.
name (string): Required. Options include saveAsData, createChunks, etc.
params (object)
type (string): Required.
name (string): Required.
knowledgeBase (string): Required.
tags (array of strings): Required.
data (object): Required.
Responses:
200: File upload process initiated or completed successfully.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
uploadUrl (string, nullable)
statusUrl (string, nullable)
contentUrl (string, nullable)
metadataUrl (string, nullable)
key (string, nullable)
400: Bad request, incorrect or missing parameters.
401: User does not have access to the file upload functionality.

200: A list of tags.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
data (object)
tags (array of strings)

Expected Data: tags (array of strings): Default is an empty array.
Responses:
200: Result of tag creation.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
message (string)

200: Result of tag deletion.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
message (string)

Expected Data:
id (string): Required.
tags (array of strings): Default is an empty array.
Responses:
200: Result of setting file tags.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
message (string)

Summary: Query files based on various filter criteria.
Expected Data:
startDate (string, date-time): Default is 2021-01-01T00:00:00Z.
pageSize (integer): Default is 10.
pageKey (object):
id (string)
createdAt (string)
type (string)
namePrefix (string or null)
createdAtPrefix (string or null)
typePrefix (string or null)
types (array of strings): Default is an empty array.
tags (array of strings): Default is an empty array.
pageIndex (integer): Default is 0.
forwardScan (boolean): Default is true.
sortIndex (string): Default is createdAt.
Responses:
200: Returns a list of files that match the query criteria.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
data (object)
items (array of objects)
pageKey (object): Key to retrieve the next page of results

Summary: Retrieve related documents based on user input through dual retrieval method.
Expected Data:
userInput (string): Required.
dataSources (array of strings): Required.
limit (integer)
Responses:
200: A list of documents related to the user input.
Content: application/json
result (array)

Summary: Retrieve related documents based on user input.
Expected Data:
userInput (string): Required.
dataSources (array of strings): Required.
limit (integer)
Responses:
200: A list of documents related to the user input.
Content: application/json
result (array)

Summary: Create a new assistant with specified attributes.
Expected Data:
name (string): Required.
description (string): Required.
assistantId (string)
tags (array of strings): Required.
instructions (string): Required.
disclaimer (string)
uri (string or null)
dataSources (array of objects): Required.
tools (array of objects): Required.
Responses:
200: Assistant creation response.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
message (string)
data (object)

Summary: Retrieve a list of all assistants.
Responses:
200: List of assistants retrieved successfully.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
message (string)
data (array)

Summary: Share an assistant with other users.
Expected Data:
assistantId (string): Required.
recipientUsers (array of strings): Required.
accessType (string): Required.
dataSources (array of strings)
policy (string): Default is an empty string.
Responses:
200: Assistant sharing response.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
message (string)

Summary: Delete an assistant by its ID.
Responses:
200: Assistant deletion response.
Content: application/json
success (boolean)
message (string)

Summary: Download files for the Code Interpreter.
Responses:
200: File download for Code Interpreter.
Content: application/json
oneOf:
FileNotFoundResponse
FileDownloadResponse
